stages.name: resource_fetch
stages.source_code: return {candidates: {request: {allowed_classes: ['econom'], limit: 400, max_distance: 2500, point: point_a, zone_id: 'moscow'}, layer_meta: layer_meta}};

stages.name: use_resource
stages.source_code: return {data: {name: 'econom', surge: {value: 42}, value_raw: 42, calculation_meta: {counts: {radius: radius, pins: 0, free: counts.free, free_chain: counts.free_chain, total: counts.total}}}};
